meanings.definition: A cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a refreshing margarita at the beach bar.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed a perfect margarita for the customer.
meanings.sent3: The margarita looked so fancy with a tiny umbrella on top.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled like a shaken margarita.
meanings.sent5: The tangy scent of the margarita lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A type of pizza topped with tomatoes, cheese, and basil.
meanings.sent1: The margarita pizza had a simple yet delicious taste.
meanings.sent2: My favorite pizza is the classic margarita with fresh basil.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't resist the gooey cheese on the margarita pizza.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the margarita pizza filled the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: Each bite of the margarita pizza was a burst of flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of flower with white petals and a yellow center.
meanings.sent1: She picked a beautiful margarita from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The margarita flower added a touch of elegance to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the fragrant margarita.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a margarita in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the margarita danced in the breeze.
